object.name: demo_site_mo

name="objective_ds" type="zope.schema.Set"> <required>False</required> <title>Objective/enabler</title> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <values> <element>Objective 1: Protect and restore marine and freshwater ecosystems and biodiversity</element> <element>Objective 2: Prevent and eliminate pollution of our oceans, seas and waters</element> <element>Objective 3: Make the sustainable blue
